title: Exploiting the IKKO Activebuds "AI powered" earbuds
summary:
The author investigated the IKKO Activebuds, "AI-powered" earbuds running Android, after seeing them featured in a "pointless tech" video. Discovering that the earbuds had ADB enabled, the author sideloaded apps and examined the ChatGPT integration. They found the device directly communicated with OpenAI using a stored API key, a major security flaw.

Further analysis revealed the earbuds communicated with various domains, including Chinese servers, and stored encrypted API endpoints. By sideloading the companion app on a rooted device, the author extracted the OpenAI key. The system prompt, including "Angry Dan" and "In-Love Dan" modes, was also exposed.

The author discovered the earbuds logged chats to a server using only the device IMEI for authentication, allowing access to anyone's chat history. Fabricating linking QR codes with a known IMEI exposed user's first and last names. The author then reported these issues to IKKO.

While IKKO temporarily took down their app and released updates adding a signature header for chat history access, significant vulnerabilities remained. The author could still inject messages into other users' companion apps and link unbound devices, leaking chat history and user names. The OpenAI keys also remained on the device.

Later updates rotated the OpenAI key and implemented an IMEI check before enabling ChatGPT, along with a proxy API. However, this API required only a specific User-Agent. The author ultimately gave up due to IKKO's insufficient response, but invites others to continue pushing for better security.
chinese_title: 利用 IKKO Activebuds “AI驱动” 耳机
chinese_summary:
作者在一段“无用科技”视频中看到了IKKO Activebuds，这是一款运行Android系统的“人工智能”耳机，于是对其进行了调查。发现该耳机启用了ADB，作者侧载了应用程序并检查了ChatGPT的集成。他们发现该设备使用存储的API密钥直接与OpenAI通信，这是一个重大的安全漏洞。

进一步分析显示，该耳机与包括中国服务器在内的多个域名通信，并存储了加密的API端点。通过在root设备上侧载配套应用，作者提取了OpenAI密钥。包括“愤怒的丹”和“恋爱中的丹”模式在内的系统提示也被曝光。

作者发现该耳机仅使用设备IMEI进行身份验证，将聊天记录记录到服务器，允许任何人访问他人的聊天记录。通过使用已知的IMEI伪造链接二维码，可以暴露用户的名字和姓氏。作者随后向IKKO报告了这些问题。

虽然IKKO暂时下架了他们的应用程序并发布了更新，为聊天记录访问添加了签名头，但仍然存在重大的漏洞。作者仍然可以将消息注入到其他用户的配套应用程序中，并链接未绑定的设备，从而泄露聊天记录和用户名。OpenAI密钥也仍然留在设备上。

后来的更新轮换了OpenAI密钥并实施了IMEI检查，之后才启用ChatGPT，同时还增加了一个代理API。然而，这个API只需要一个特定的User-Agent。作者最终因IKKO的回应不足而放弃，但邀请其他人继续推动更好的安全性。

title: Gene therapy restored hearing in deaf patients
summary:
A new study published in *Nature Medicine* reports that gene therapy has successfully restored hearing in patients with congenital deafness or severe hearing impairment caused by mutations in the OTOF gene. The study, conducted by researchers at Karolinska Institutet and hospitals/universities in China, involved ten patients aged 1 to 24 who received a single injection of a synthetic adeno-associated virus (AAV) delivering a functional OTOF gene to the inner ear.

The treatment proved rapid, with most patients experiencing hearing improvement within a month. After a six-month follow-up, all participants showed significant hearing improvement, with the average volume of perceptible sound improving from 106 to 52 decibels. Younger patients, particularly those aged 5-8, demonstrated the best response. One seven-year-old girl recovered nearly all her hearing and could hold conversations. The therapy also showed efficacy in adult participants.

Researchers emphasize the significance of this advancement, noting its potential to be life-changing. The treatment was well-tolerated, with the most common adverse reaction being a reduction in neutrophils. No serious adverse reactions were reported.

The researchers are now expanding their focus to treat other, more common genes responsible for deafness, such as GJB2 and TMC1. This study was a collaboration between multiple institutions and was financed by Chinese research programs and Otovia Therapeutics Inc.

title: Don’t use “click here” as link text (2001)
summary:
This W3C QA Tip from 2001 argues against using "click here" as link text, advocating for more descriptive and meaningful links. The core message is that link text should be informative even when read out of context, explaining what the link offers to the user without focusing on the mechanics of interacting with it.

The article advises webmasters to avoid generic phrases and verb phrases within link text. Instead of "click here to download Amaya," it suggests a more direct and informative "Get Amaya!". Similarly, rather than "Tell me more about Amaya," the article proposes a richer description like "Tell me more about Amaya: W3C's free editor/browser...".

The reasoning behind this recommendation is that not all users will be clicking, and relying on visual cues like "click here" can be inaccessible. Clear, descriptive link text improves usability, accessibility, and overall user experience by providing context and purpose.

The article also references other resources, including the W3C HTML Techniques for Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 and articles by Tim Berners-Lee and Jutta Degener, to further support its argument for effective hypertext writing. The QA Tips are presented as informative guidance from the W3C Quality Assurance Interest Group, not as normative technical specifications.
chinese_title: 不要使用“点击这里”作为链接文本 (2001)
chinese_summary:
这篇来自2001年的W3C QA技巧反对使用“点击这里”作为链接文本，提倡使用更具描述性和意义的链接。其核心信息是，即使链接文本脱离上下文阅读，也应具有信息量，解释链接为用户提供的内容，而不是专注于与之交互的机制。

文章建议网站管理员避免在链接文本中使用通用短语和动词短语。它建议使用更直接和信息丰富的“获取Amaya！”来代替“点击这里下载Amaya”， 同样，文章建议使用更丰富的描述，如“告诉我更多关于Amaya的信息：W3C的免费编辑器/浏览器...”来代替“告诉我更多关于Amaya的信息”。

此建议背后的原因是并非所有用户都会点击，并且依赖“点击这里”之类的视觉提示可能无法访问。清晰、描述性的链接文本通过提供上下文和目的，提高了可用性、可访问性和整体用户体验。

文章还引用了其他资源，包括 W3C HTML Web 内容可访问性指南 1.0 技术和 Tim Berners-Lee 和 Jutta Degener 的文章，以进一步支持其关于有效超文本写作的论点。QA 技巧以 W3C 质量保证兴趣小组提供的信息性指导的形式呈现，而不是作为规范性技术规范。

title: Sony's Mark Cerny Has Worked on "Big Chunks of RDNA 5" with AMD

The article emphasizes that while details are scarce, Cerny's involvement in RDNA 5 implies a strong synergy between Sony's console development and AMD's GPU roadmap. title: Double Is Winding Down
summary:
Double, an automated portfolio investing platform, is ceasing operations due to insufficient customer acquisition to sustain the business. The company is winding down in the coming weeks, with a final operations date of July 31, 2025.

Customers are instructed to withdraw their cash or transfer assets to another brokerage by July 31, 2025. Double will continue normal trading operations, including automated trading, liquidations, rebalancing, and tax loss harvesting, until July 30, 2025. Customers can manually disable auto-trading.

Key dates include:

*   **July 2, 2025:** No new accounts or inbound transfers accepted.
*   **July 30, 2025:** Automated trading ceases.
*   **July 31, 2025:** Deadline for account liquidation or asset transfer.

After July 31, 2025, the Double website will have limited functionality, and remaining accounts may require manual transfer through Apex Clearing (Double will cover the ACATS fee if contacted beforehand).

Double suggests liquidating and withdrawing cash or initiating an ACATS transfer to another brokerage, mentioning options like Wealthfront, Frec, M1 Finance, Fidelity, Schwab, Robinhood, and Public. They advise considering portfolio composition when choosing a new brokerage. They also encourage creating an account directly with Apex Clearing for access to account documents.

Double is open-sourcing its optimization engine, Oracle, for users interested in setting up their own trading bot on Alpaca.

title: Azure API vulnerability and roles misconfiguration compromise corporate networks
summary:
This blog post by Token Security researchers details a critical vulnerability in Azure's Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system. The research uncovered that several built-in Azure roles are misconfigured, granting broader permissions than their descriptions suggest, leading to potential over-privilege. Specifically, the "Managed Applications Reader" role, along with nine other roles, includes the "*/read" permission, effectively granting read access to almost all Azure resources, despite being intended for more specific service-related functions.

This overly broad read permission, normally associated with the "Reader" role, can be exploited to access sensitive information, including credentials within Automation Accounts, deployment scripts, and web applications. It also allows attackers to discover sensitive data in storage accounts and databases, plan attacks by examining role assignments and network configurations, and identify critical resources through resource locks and backup vaults.

Furthermore, the research identified an Azure API vulnerability related to VPN shared keys. The "Get VirtualNetworkGatewaySharedKey" API call, accessible with the "*/read" permission, allows attackers to leak VPN keys. The blog explained that this is likely due to it being implemented with the HTTP 'GET' method instead of 'POST'.

Combined, these issues create a dangerous attack chain where a user with limited permissions can gain access to both cloud and on-premises networks. The post stresses the importance of carefully reviewing Azure role assignments and encourages organizations to be aware of these identity-driven attack vectors to mitigate potential risks.
chinese_title: Azure API 漏洞和角色配置错误导致企业网络受损
chinese_summary:
Token Security研究人员的这篇博文详细介绍了Azure基于角色的访问控制(RBAC)系统中的一个严重漏洞。该研究发现，几个内置Azure角色配置错误，授予的权限范围比其描述的更大，导致潜在的过度授权。具体而言，“托管应用程序读取者”角色以及其他九个角色包含“*/read”权限，实际上授予了对几乎所有Azure资源的读取权限，尽管其本意是用于更具体的服务相关功能。

这种过度宽泛的读取权限，通常与“读取者”角色相关联，可能被利用来访问敏感信息，包括自动化帐户中的凭据、部署脚本和Web应用程序。它还允许攻击者发现存储帐户和数据库中的敏感数据，通过检查角色分配和网络配置来计划攻击，并通过资源锁和备份存储库来识别关键资源。

此外，该研究还发现了一个与VPN共享密钥相关的Azure API漏洞。 通过“*/read”权限可以访问的“Get VirtualNetworkGatewaySharedKey”API调用允许攻击者泄露VPN密钥。 该博文解释说，这可能是因为它使用HTTP 'GET'方法而不是'POST'方法实现的。

总而言之，这些问题创建了一条危险的攻击链，权限有限的用户可以借此访问云和本地网络。该文章强调了仔细审查Azure角色分配的重要性，并鼓励组织注意这些由身份驱动的攻击载体，以减轻潜在风险。

title: How large are large language models?
summary:
This article chronicles the evolution of large language model (LLM) sizes, focusing on base models designed for raw text continuation, from 2019 to 2025. It starts with the GPT series (GPT-2, GPT-3) and then shifts to Meta's Llama family, including the unreleased Llama-4. A key turning point was the release of Llama-3.1 (405B), a large dense model, and the subsequent surge of Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) models.

The author highlights a period where downloadable LLMs comparable to GPT-3 were scarce, hindering efforts to replicate its performance using smaller models. The MoE architecture, allowing for larger models with fewer active parameters, revolutionized the landscape, with models like Mistral's Mixtral series becoming available.

The article then details several large MoE models released from late 2024 to mid-2025, primarily from Chinese companies, including Deepseek V3 Base (671B), Databricks (132B), Minimax (456B), Dots (143B), Hunyuan (80B), and Ernie (424B). These models often incorporate multi-modal and multi-lingual capabilities.

The author expresses concern about the "annealing" trend, where models are fine-tuned on specific datasets (code and math) to improve benchmark scores, potentially biasing them away from pure text continuation. They also question how well current benchmarks capture the nuances of LLM intelligence and highlight the current trend towards AI assistant chatbots, urging exploration of alternative applications for raw text continuation engines. The author also expresses concerns that recent data included in pretraining results in the models being more like an 'assistant' than a 'base model'.
chinese_title: 大型语言模型有多大？
chinese_summary:
本文记录了大型语言模型 (LLM) 尺寸的演变，重点关注 2019 年至 2025 年间为原始文本续写而设计的基座模型。它从 GPT 系列（GPT-2、GPT-3）开始，然后转向 Meta 的 Llama 系列，包括未发布的 Llama-4。Llama-3.1 (405B) 的发布是一个关键转折点，它是一个大型密集模型，随后是混合专家 (MoE) 模型的激增。

作者强调了一个时期，当时与 GPT-3 相当的可下载 LLM 非常稀缺，阻碍了使用较小模型复制其性能的努力。MoE 架构允许构建更大的模型，同时减少了激活参数的数量，彻底改变了这一局面，像 Mistral 的 Mixtral 系列这样的模型开始可用。

文章随后详细介绍了 2024 年末至 2025 年中发布的一些大型 MoE 模型，主要来自中国公司，包括 Deepseek V3 Base (671B)、Databricks (132B)、Minimax (456B)、Dots (143B)、Hunyuan (80B) 和 Ernie (424B)。这些模型通常包含多模态和多语言能力。

作者对“退火”趋势表示担忧，即在特定数据集（代码和数学）上微调模型以提高基准分数，这可能会使它们偏离纯文本续写。他们还质疑当前基准测试在多大程度上捕捉了 LLM 智能的细微差别，并强调了当前 AI 助手聊天机器人的趋势，敦促探索原始文本续写引擎的替代应用。作者还担心预训练中包含的最新数据会导致模型更像“助手”而不是“基座模型”。

title: A List Is a Monad
summary:
This article introduces monads as a powerful pattern in functional programming, explaining them as computational contexts that handle control flow. Monads come in two flavors: "Results," representing already-computed values with added context (like `List<T>` or `Maybe<T>`), and "Recipes," representing deferred computations (like `Task<T>`).

The article focuses on "Result" monads, using `List` and `Maybe` as examples. Monads require `Unit` (for wrapping a value) and `flatMap` (for chaining operations while avoiding nested containers) operations. `Map` applies a function to each value within the monad, while `flatMap` also flattens the result.

The author emphasizes that monads are not just fancy containers; their true power lies in abstracting control flow. By delegating the "how" to the monad, the business logic stays declarative and composable. Using `Maybe` demonstrates how a monad can handle the potential absence of a value, avoiding the need for explicit null checks.  It is argued that the ability to chain monads through `flatMap` is key.

Finally, the article introduces the three monad laws (Left Identity, Right Identity, and Associativity), ensuring predictable behavior during operation chaining. These laws are mathematical guarantees that allows monads to be composed reliably.
chinese_title: 列表是一个Monad
chinese_summary:
本文介绍了 Monad，将其作为函数式编程中一种强大的模式，并解释为处理控制流的计算上下文。 Monad 有两种类型：“结果”（Results），表示已经计算好的值，并带有额外的上下文（如 `List<T>` 或 `Maybe<T>`）；以及“配方”（Recipes），表示延迟计算（如 `Task<T>`）。

本文重点介绍“结果” Monad，并使用 `List` 和 `Maybe` 作为示例。 Monad 需要 `Unit` （用于包装一个值）和 `flatMap` （用于链接操作，同时避免嵌套容器）操作。 `Map` 将一个函数应用于 Monad 中的每个值，而 `flatMap` 也会展平结果。

作者强调，Monad 不仅仅是花哨的容器；它们的真正力量在于抽象控制流。 通过将“如何做”委托给 Monad，业务逻辑保持声明式和可组合。 使用 `Maybe` 演示了 Monad 如何处理潜在的值缺失，从而避免了显式的空值检查。 文章认为，通过 `flatMap` 链接 Monad 的能力是关键。

最后，本文介绍了 Monad 的三个定律（左单位元律、右单位元律和结合律），以确保操作链中的可预测行为。 这些定律是数学保证，允许 Monad 可靠地组合。

title: ICEBlock climbs to the top of the App Store charts after officials slam it
summary:
The ICEBlock app, which allows users to report and track ICE agent sightings, has surged in popularity, reaching the top of the App Store charts after condemnation from US government officials and coverage by CNN. Developed by Joshua Aaron in response to the Trump administration's immigration policies, the app enables users to mark ICE agent locations on a map and share details like clothing and vehicles, alerting users within a five-mile radius.

The app's rise followed a CNN report that highlighted its functionality and initial user base of 20,000, primarily in Los Angeles. However, the White House and ICE officials have criticized the app, claiming it endangers law enforcement officers and facilitates criminal activity. Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt alleged that CNN's coverage incited violence against ICE agents, while ICE Acting Director Todd M. Lyons accused CNN of reckless journalism.

US Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem and US Attorney General Pam Bondi have indicated that the government is investigating Aaron, suggesting his actions could be construed as a threat to law enforcement and not protected speech. Aaron asserts that ICEBlock does not collect personal data and is exclusively available on iOS to protect user privacy.
chinese_title: 官员抨击后，ICEBlock 登上 App Store 排行榜榜首
chinese_summary:

在CNN报道突出了该应用的功能和最初2万名用户的用户群（主要在洛杉矶）之后，该应用迅速走红。然而，白宫和ICE官员批评该应用，声称它危害了执法人员并助长了犯罪活动。新闻秘书Karoline Leavitt声称CNN的报道煽动了针对ICE特工的暴力行为，而ICE代理局长Todd M. Lyons指责CNN进行了鲁莽的新闻报道。

美国国土安全部部长Kristi Noem和美国司法部长Pam Bondi表示，政府正在调查Aaron，暗示他的行为可能被视为对执法的威胁，并不受言论自由保护。Aaron则坚称ICEBlock不收集个人数据，并且仅在iOS系统上可用，以保护用户隐私。

title: Huawei releases an open weight model trained on Huawei Ascend GPUs
summary:
This arXiv article (arXiv:2505.21411) introduces "Pangu Pro MoE," a Mixture of Grouped Experts (MoGE) model developed by Huawei and other contributors. The model aims to improve the efficiency of sparse large language models by addressing the issue of imbalanced expert workload distribution in traditional MoE architectures.

Pangu Pro MoE groups experts during the token selection process, ensuring a more balanced computational load across devices when the model is distributed. This architecture is designed to enhance throughput, particularly during inference.

The model, based on MoGE, boasts 72 billion total parameters, with 16 billion activated per token, and is optimized for Huawei Ascend NPUs (Ascend 300I Duo and 800I A2). Experiments demonstrate that MoGE achieves better expert load balancing and more efficient execution during both training and inference on these NPUs.

The inference performance of Pangu Pro MoE reaches 1148 tokens/s per card, which can be further improved to 1528 tokens/s per card through speculative acceleration. This outperforms comparable 32B and 72B dense models. The study also highlights the excellent cost-to-performance ratio of model inference on Ascend 300I Duo. The authors claim that Ascend NPUs enable Pangu Pro MoE to outperform prominent open-source models like GLM-Z1-32B and Qwen3-32B within the sub-100B parameter class. Therefore, Huawei releases an open weight model trained on Huawei Ascend GPUs

title: Private sector lost 33k jobs, badly missing expectations of 100k increase

The largest job losses were in service roles, particularly in professional/business services and health/education. Conversely, goods-producing positions saw an increase. While the ADP report's accuracy in predicting the official government jobs report is questionable, the market is anticipating the nonfarm payrolls report on Thursday, with an expected increase of 110,000 jobs and a potential rise in the unemployment rate to 4.3%. title: Hexagon fuzz: Full-system emulated fuzzing of Qualcomm basebands
summary:
This article discusses "Hexagon fuzz," a new open-source toolchain developed for full-system emulated fuzzing of Qualcomm Hexagon basebands, which are prevalent in smartphones but lack robust security tooling due to their proprietary architecture.

The authors highlight the gap in existing baseband security research, as tools like FirmWire don't support Hexagon's custom CPU architecture and operating system. To address this, they forked a QEMU version from the Qualcomm Innovation Center (QuIC) with Hexagon full-system emulation support and integrated it with LibAFL's QEMU fork to create a custom fuzzer.

The toolchain allows users to emulate Hexagon baseband firmware, add breakpoints, modify runtime behavior via Rust hooks, skip initialization functions, instrument functions for debugging, and perform coverage-guided fuzzing. They developed a visualized coverage script that parses QEMU debug logs and colors the program counter in Ghidra, aiding reverse engineering efforts.

The current implementation successfully boots iPhone baseband firmware, instruments control flow, and provides basic fuzzing infrastructure. Future plans include better target function identification, decompression support, enhanced fuzzing harnesses, and integration with dynamic testing interfaces. The toolchain aims to improve the transparency and security posture of Hexagon-based devices, and the resources are available on GitHub.

title: I'm dialing back my LLM usage
summary:

While LLMs showed promise with initial features and autocomplete, Alberto found they often produced low-quality code, introduced new errors while fixing old ones, and ultimately hindered productivity when rebuilding his infrastructure with Go and ClickHouse.

He realized the initial excitement created a "productivity illusion," leading to unrealistic expectations about the capabilities of LLMs. Alberto emphasized a crucial "mental shift" – viewing the LLM as an assistant, not the architect or senior engineer. He regained control by focusing LLM usage on smaller tasks like refactoring or small-scoped features, while personally addressing more significant issues and maintaining overall architectural vision.

Alberto underscores the importance of realistic expectations and encourages other senior developers to trust their existing skills. He advises using AI to leverage existing knowledge but cautions against complete reliance, emphasizing that architectural abstractions and product decisions still require human expertise. Ultimately, Alberto advocates for a balanced approach, acknowledging the potential of AI but recognizing that the technology is still evolving and requires careful integration into existing workflows.

title: A proof-of-concept neural brain implant providing speech
summary:
This article discusses a proof-of-concept neural brain implant developed at the University of California, Davis, designed to translate brain signals directly into speech for individuals with paralysis. Unlike previous brain-computer interfaces (BCIs) that focused on text translation with significant latency and limited vocabulary, this new prosthesis aims to create a "fully digital vocal tract" by translating brain signals into phonemes and words in real-time.

Led by Maitreyee Wairagkar, the team implanted 256 microelectrodes into the ventral precentral gyrus of a 46-year-old ALS patient (T15), enabling the system to extract speech features like pitch and voicing. These features were then fed into a vocoder to synthesize speech resembling T15's original voice. The system boasts a low latency of approximately 10 milliseconds, allowing for instantaneous conversion of brain signals into sounds.

While the system achieved 100% intelligibility in a sentence-matching test, it had a word error rate of 43.75% in open transcription tests, indicating it's not yet reliable for everyday conversation. Despite its limitations, the technology represents a significant step forward, allowing the patient to express nuances like intonation and use words outside a predefined dictionary. Researchers believe increasing the number of electrodes, as planned by companies like Paradromics, could significantly improve performance. Clinical trials using a 1,600-electrode system are already being planned at UC Davis.
chinese_title: 概念验证型神经脑植入体，可提供语音
chinese_summary:
加州大学戴维斯分校开发出神经脑植入概念验证，旨在将脑信号直接转化为瘫痪人士的语音。与先前专注于文本翻译、存在显著延迟和词汇量有限的脑机接口 (BCI) 不同，这种新型假体旨在通过将脑信号实时翻译成音素和单词，创建一个“完全数字化的声道”。

在 Maitreyee Wairagkar 的带领下，该团队将 256 个微电极植入一位 46 岁的 ALS 患者 (T15) 的腹侧前中央回，使系统能够提取语音特征，如音高和发声。然后将这些特征输入到声码器中，以合成类似于 T15 原始声音的语音。该系统拥有大约 10 毫秒的低延迟，可将脑信号瞬间转换为声音。

虽然该系统在句子匹配测试中实现了 100% 的可懂度，但在开放式转录测试中的词错率达到了 43.75%，表明它尚未可靠到可以用于日常对话。尽管存在局限性，但这项技术代表着向前迈出的重要一步，使患者能够表达诸如语调之类的细微差别，并使用预定义词典之外的单词。研究人员认为，增加电极数量（如 Paradromics 等公司计划的那样）可以显著提高性能。在加州大学戴维斯分校，已经计划使用 1600 电极系统进行临床试验。

title: Fakespot shuts down today after 9 years of detecting fake product reviews
summary:
Fakespot, a popular tool for detecting fake online reviews, shut down on July 1, 2025, after nine years of service. Founded in 2016 by Saoud Khalifah, Fakespot used AI to analyze reviews on platforms like Amazon, eBay, and Walmart, identifying patterns indicative of unreliable or fabricated feedback. Studies revealed that a significant portion of product reviews, particularly in categories like clothing and jewelry, were unreliable.

The company raised $7 million in funding and was acquired by Mozilla in 2023. Mozilla integrated Fakespot's technology into Firefox as the "Mozilla Review Checker," offering users an easy way to verify product reviews. However, in May 2025, Mozilla announced the discontinuation of Fakespot and Pocket due to sustainability challenges, redirecting resources towards core Firefox features and AI-powered innovations.

The closure has left a void for users who relied on Fakespot to make informed purchasing decisions. The article highlights the ongoing need for trustworthy review analysis and introduces TrueStar, a new tool aiming to be Fakespot's "spiritual successor" by using modern AI and sustainable economics. The author bids farewell to Fakespot, acknowledging its role in fighting fraud and promoting authenticity in online shopping.
chinese_title: Fakespot在检测虚假产品评论9年后于今日关闭。
chinese_summary:
Fakespot于2025年7月1日关闭，此前已运营九年，是一款用于检测虚假在线评论的流行工具。Fakespot由Saoud Khalifah于2016年创立，利用人工智能分析亚马逊、eBay和沃尔玛等平台上的评论，识别表明反馈不可靠或捏造的模式。研究表明，很大一部分产品评论，尤其是在服装和珠宝等类别中，都不可靠。

该公司筹集了700万美元的资金，并于2023年被Mozilla收购。Mozilla将Fakespot的技术整合到Firefox中，作为“Mozilla Review Checker”，为用户提供了一种验证产品评论的简便方法。然而，在2025年5月，Mozilla宣布由于可持续性挑战，将停止Fakespot和Pocket，并将资源重新导向核心Firefox功能和人工智能驱动的创新。

此次关闭给那些依靠Fakespot做出明智购买决定的用户留下了一个空白。这篇文章强调了对可信赖的评论分析的持续需求，并介绍了TrueStar，这是一种旨在成为Fakespot“精神继承者”的新工具，它使用了现代人工智能和可持续的经济模式。作者告别了Fakespot，承认它在打击欺诈和促进在线购物真实性方面的作用。

title: Chatbot Flow Editor – Visual tool for designing conversation flows
summary:
The Chatbot Flow Editor is a visual, browser-based tool for designing chatbot conversation flows. It allows users to create, test, and export flows as JSON, streamlining chatbot development. The editor can be installed as a development dependency using `npm install --save-dev @enumura/chatbot-flow-editor` and launched with `npx @enumura/chatbot-flow-editor`.

Users can create conversation nodes, edit their content and options, and simulate user interactions via a chat preview. Flows are exported as JSON files, defining conversation points and options.  The JSON structure consists of nodes with IDs, titles, and options that link to other nodes via `nextId`.

Integration involves loading the exported JSON into your chatbot application and using it to drive the conversation logic.  A code example demonstrates a basic navigation using the flow data.

The tool supports creating nodes, editing content, testing flows, and exporting/importing JSON.  A development workflow is outlined, detailing design, test, export, and integration phases. The editor requires Node.js 20.0.0 or higher and is licensed under the MIT License. Documentation is available for getting started, user guides, and understanding the JSON structure.
chinese_title: 聊天机器人流程编辑器 – 可视化会话流程设计工具
chinese_summary:
聊天机器人流程编辑器是一个基于浏览器的可视化工具，用于设计聊天机器人对话流程。它允许用户创建、测试和导出流程为JSON格式，从而简化聊天机器人开发。该编辑器可以使用 `npm install --save-dev @enumura/chatbot-flow-editor` 作为开发依赖项安装，并使用 `npx @enumura/chatbot-flow-editor` 启动。

用户可以创建对话节点，编辑其内容和选项，并通过聊天预览模拟用户交互。流程导出为JSON文件，定义对话节点和选项。JSON结构由带有ID、标题和选项的节点组成，这些选项通过 `nextId` 链接到其他节点。

集成涉及将导出的JSON加载到您的聊天机器人应用程序中，并使用它来驱动对话逻辑。代码示例演示了使用流程数据的基本导航。

该工具支持创建节点、编辑内容、测试流程和导出/导入JSON。概述了开发工作流程，详细说明了设计、测试、导出和集成阶段。该编辑器需要Node.js 20.0.0或更高版本，并根据MIT许可证授权。提供入门指南、用户手册和理解JSON结构的文档。

title: What I learned gathering nootropic ratings
summary:
This article analyzes nootropic ratings gathered from a recommender system and the SlateStarCodex nootropics survey, totaling 36,163 ratings from 2,802 people. It emphasizes that individual experiences with nootropics vary significantly. The rating scale used ranges from 0 (useless) to 10 (life-changing).

The author acknowledges biases in the data, including lack of random allocation, self-reporting, and lack of control/blinding, and focuses on comparing nootropics despite these issues. The analysis includes mean ratings, the probability of a positive effect, and the probability of a life-changing effect for various nootropics.

The article also investigates the risks associated with nootropics, particularly addiction, tolerance, and side effects, while acknowledging the uncertainty in these estimates due to non-response bias.

Key findings include:

*   **Lifestyle changes are potent nootropics:** Sleep and exercise, particularly weightlifting, are highly rated, even compared to prescription medications.
*   **Diets can be beneficial:** The Paleo diet seems promising.
*   **Common nootropics may not be the best:** Many popular nootropics like Piracetam, Ashwagandha, and Ginseng received relatively poor ratings compared to less common substances and lifestyle interventions.
*   **Potent nootropics may be worth trying:** The author suggests exploring more potent options for potentially life-changing results.
chinese_title: 我收集益智药评级的心得
chinese_summary:
本文分析了从推荐系统和SlateStarCodex聪明药调查中收集的聪明药评分，总计来自2802人的36163个评分。文章强调，个人对聪明药的体验差异很大。使用的评分范围从0（无用）到10（改变生活）。

作者承认数据存在偏差，包括缺乏随机分配、自我报告以及缺乏控制/双盲，并在这些问题存在的情况下，侧重于比较各种聪明药。分析包括平均评分、产生积极效果的概率以及各种聪明药产生改变生活效果的概率。

文章还调查了与聪明药相关的风险，特别是成瘾性、耐受性和副作用，同时承认由于非回应偏差，这些估计存在不确定性。

主要发现包括：

*   **生活方式的改变是有效的聪明药：** 睡眠和运动，特别是举重，即使与处方药相比，也获得了很高的评价。
*   **饮食可能是有益的：** 原始饮食似乎很有前景。
*   **常见的聪明药可能不是最好的：** 许多流行的聪明药，如吡拉西坦、南非醉茄和人参，与不太常见的物质和生活方式干预相比，获得的评分相对较低。
*   **强效聪明药可能值得一试：** 作者建议探索更强效的选择，以获得潜在的改变生活的效果。

title: IntyBASIC: A Basic Compiler for Intellivision
summary:
IntyBASIC is a BASIC compiler designed to allow programmers to create games and applications for the Intellivision home video game console. Developed by Oscar Toledo G., it aims to overcome the limitations of the original BASIC interpreter released for the Intellivision, which suffered from slow performance and limited features.

The compiler works by translating BASIC code into native assembly language for the General Instrument AY-3-8900 CPU, the processor at the heart of the Intellivision. This compilation process significantly improves the execution speed of BASIC programs, making them suitable for creating more complex and responsive games.

IntyBASIC offers a comprehensive set of commands and functions, encompassing graphics manipulation (including sprite handling), sound effects, input handling (keyboard, controllers), and memory management. It supports various Intellivision-specific hardware features, providing programmers with low-level control over the console's capabilities.

The compiler includes an IDE (Integrated Development Environment) or can be used with command-line tools, making it relatively easy to write, compile, and test IntyBASIC programs. The resulting compiled code can then be loaded onto an Intellivision console or run in an emulator.

In essence, IntyBASIC provides a modern and powerful tool for Intellivision developers, enabling them to create more sophisticated and performant software for the classic console than was previously possible with the original BASIC interpreter. It offers a blend of ease of use of BASIC with the performance benefits of compiled code.
chinese_title: IntyBASIC：Intellivision平台的Basic编译器
chinese_summary:
IntyBASIC 是一种 BASIC 编译器，旨在让程序员能够为 Intellivision 家庭视频游戏机创建游戏和应用程序。 它由 Oscar Toledo G. 开发，旨在克服为 Intellivision 发布的原始 BASIC 解释器的局限性，后者存在性能缓慢和功能有限的问题。

该编译器的工作原理是将 BASIC 代码翻译成 General Instrument AY-3-8900 CPU 的本地汇编语言，这是 Intellivision 的核心处理器。 这种编译过程显着提高了 BASIC 程序的执行速度，使其适合创建更复杂、响应更快的游戏。

IntyBASIC 提供了一套全面的命令和函数，涵盖图形处理（包括精灵处理）、音效、输入处理（键盘、控制器）和内存管理。 它支持各种 Intellivision 特定的硬件功能，为程序员提供对游戏机功能的低级控制。

该编译器包含一个 IDE（集成开发环境）或可以与命令行工具一起使用，从而相对容易地编写、编译和测试 IntyBASIC 程序。 然后，可以将生成的已编译代码加载到 Intellivision 游戏机上或在模拟器中运行。

本质上，IntyBASIC 为 Intellivision 开发人员提供了一种现代而强大的工具，使他们能够为这款经典游戏机创建比以前使用原始 BASIC 解释器更复杂、性能更高的软件。 它融合了 BASIC 的易用性以及编译代码的性能优势。

title: Hilbert's sixth problem: derivation of fluid equations via Boltzmann's theory
summary: This arXiv article, submitted on March 3, 2025, by Yu Deng, Zaher Hani, and Xiao Ma, addresses Hilbert's sixth problem, concerning the derivation of fluid equations from fundamental physics. Titled "Hilbert's sixth problem: derivation of fluid equations via Boltzmann's kinetic theory," the paper claims to rigorously derive the fundamental partial differential equations (PDEs) of fluid mechanics, specifically the compressible Euler and incompressible Navier-Stokes-Fourier equations. The derivation starts from a system of hard sphere particles undergoing elastic collisions. The authors achieve this by first deriving the Boltzmann equation on 2D and 3D tori, which builds upon their previous work (arXiv:2408.07818). The paper consists of 48 pages and includes 5 figures. It is categorized under Analysis of PDEs (math.AP) and Mathematical Physics (math-ph) and uses MSC classes 35Q20, 76P05, and 82C40. There's noted text overlap with the authors' earlier publication, arXiv:2408.07818. The paper can be cited as arXiv:2503.01800 [math.AP].
chinese_title: 希尔伯特第六问题：通过玻尔兹曼理论推导流体方程
chinese_summary: 这篇由余登、Zaher Hani和肖马于2025年3月3日提交的arXiv文章，探讨了希尔伯特第六问题，即从基本物理推导流体方程。该论文题为“希尔伯特第六问题：通过玻尔兹曼动理学理论推导流体方程”，声称严格推导了流体力学的基本偏微分方程（PDE），特别是可压缩欧拉方程和不可压缩纳维-斯托克斯-傅里叶方程。推导始于一个经历弹性碰撞的硬球粒子系统。作者首先推导出二维和三维环上的玻尔兹曼方程，这是基于他们之前的研究成果(arXiv:2408.07818)。该论文共48页，包含5个图。它被归类为偏微分方程分析(math.AP)和数学物理(math-ph)，并使用了MSC分类35Q20、76P05和82C40。其中指出该文章与作者早期发表的文章arXiv:2408.07818存在文本重叠。该论文可引用为arXiv:2503.01800 [math.AP]。

title: Content Independence Day: no AI crawl without compensation
summary:
Matthew Prince's "Content Independence Day" argues that the traditional web business model, where content creators are compensated with traffic in exchange for allowing search engines to copy their content, is no longer viable in the age of AI. With AI systems increasingly answering questions directly, bypassing the need for users to visit original sources, content creators are seeing a dramatic decrease in traffic and, consequently, revenue from ads and subscriptions.

Prince highlights the stark difference in traffic generation between traditional Google searches and newer AI tools like OpenAI and Anthropic, demonstrating the massive reduction in traffic potential for creators. He contends that AI crawlers are "stripmining" the web, consuming content without adequately compensating creators.

As a solution, Cloudflare, along with publishers and AI companies, is declaring July 1st "Content Independence Day" and will begin blocking AI crawlers by default unless they pay for the content they use. Furthermore, Cloudflare aims to create a marketplace where content creators and AI companies can negotiate fair compensation. This marketplace would value content based on its uniqueness and contribution to AI knowledge, rather than solely on traffic generated. The goal is to incentivize high-value content creation and foster a sustainable ecosystem where creators are fairly rewarded for their work, paving the way for a better, more equitable web in the AI era.
chinese_title: 内容独立日：未经补偿，禁止AI抓取
chinese_summary:
马修·普林斯在“内容独立日”中指出，传统的网络商业模式，即内容创作者通过允许搜索引擎复制其内容来换取流量的补偿方式，在人工智能时代已不再可行。随着人工智能系统越来越多地直接回答问题，绕过了用户访问原始来源的需求，内容创作者正面临流量的急剧下降，进而导致广告和订阅收入的减少。

普林斯强调了传统谷歌搜索与像 OpenAI 和 Anthropic 这样的新型人工智能工具在流量生成方面的巨大差异，表明了创作者流量潜力的巨大降低。他认为，人工智能爬虫正在“ stripmining”网络，消耗内容而没有充分补偿创作者。

作为解决方案，Cloudflare 与出版商和人工智能公司一起，宣布 7 月 1 日为“内容独立日”，并将默认阻止人工智能爬虫，除非它们为所使用的内容付费。此外，Cloudflare 旨在创建一个市场，内容创作者和人工智能公司可以在此协商公平的补偿。该市场将根据内容的独特性和对人工智能知识的贡献来评估内容价值，而不是仅仅基于产生的流量。目标是激励高价值内容的创作，并建立一个可持续的生态系统，让创作者因其工作而获得公平的回报，从而为人工智能时代一个更好、更公平的网络铺平道路。

title: Sam Altman Slams Meta’s AI Talent Poaching: 'Missionaries Will Beat Mercenaries'
summary:
Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, has responded to Meta's aggressive poaching of AI talent, particularly for Meta's new superintelligence team led by Alexandr Wang and Nat Friedman. Altman, in a message to OpenAI researchers, downplayed the impact of the departures, suggesting Meta had to reach far down its list to secure talent and calling their recruiting tactics "distasteful."

He emphasized OpenAI's superior, mission-driven culture centered on building artificial general intelligence (AGI) responsibly, contrasting it with Meta's potentially problematic culture driven by short-term gains and diluted focus. Altman used the analogy of "missionaries" versus "mercenaries," implying that OpenAI's dedication to AGI will ultimately triumph.

Altman also highlighted OpenAI's commitment to employee compensation, hinting at potential improvements and emphasizing the greater long-term upside of OpenAI stock compared to Meta. He reaffirmed his confidence in OpenAI's research roadmap, compute resources, and unique team culture, asserting that OpenAI's focus on AGI differentiates it from companies like Meta, which may shift priorities.

Following Altman's message, several high-ranking OpenAI employees echoed his sentiments on Slack, reinforcing the idea that OpenAI’s unique and innovative culture makes it a better place to work than Meta. They highlighted Meta's tendency to change focus as a key differentiator, favoring OpenAI's steadfast commitment to AGI.

title: Why Do Swallows Fly to the Korean DMZ?
summary:
T. Yejoo Kim's article, "Why Do Swallows Fly to the Korean DMZ?" explores the Korean Demilitarized Zone (DMZ) through the lens of personal connection, displacement, and the symbolic role of barn swallows (jebi). Kim, a third-generation sirhyangmin (displaced person), recounts her journey to the DMZ for the 70th anniversary of the Korean War armistice.

The jebi, which migrates annually between Korea and southern climates, serves as a poignant symbol of hope and return for sirhyangmin who resettled near the DMZ, particularly in Ganghwa County. These residents build nests for the swallows, seeing them as a reminder of the possibility of return to their northern homes, a freedom they themselves are denied.

The article highlights the paradox of the Han River estuary, a "neutral" zone within the DMZ where civilians were once free to cross and connect. Despite its designation, heavy militarization and surveillance have transformed it into a space of danger, accessible only to birds.

Kim's personal narrative intertwines with the broader themes of division and longing. A road trip with her uncle, whose ancestral home lies just across the border, reveals the deep emotional impact of the cemented division. Despite the pain, a "homing instinct" similar to the jebi draws them back to the estuary, highlighting the enduring ties to the divided land and the ongoing search for connection across the border. The article underscores the DMZ's complex reality as both an impenetrable boundary and a site of potential reunion, symbolized by the free flight of the swallows.

title: Soldier’s wrist purse discovered at Roman legionary camp
summary:
Archaeologists have discovered a fragment of a Roman soldier's wrist purse at a temporary Roman camp site in South Moravia, Czech Republic. The camp was used by the 10th Legion between AD 172 and 180 during the Marcomannic Wars.

The discovery is significant because it's outside the Roman Empire's traditional boundaries. The purse, described as a small "moneybox," was designed to be worn on the left arm, leaving the right hand free for combat.

Although no coins were inside the purse, a large quantity of Roman coinage was found nearby. Experts estimate the purse could hold about 50 silver denarii, close to a Roman legionary's yearly salary. The bronze purse likely held soldiers' personal funds and "service cash" for operational expenses. It highlights the logistical complexities of Roman military campaigns and offers insight into the lives of soldiers on the empire's frontier.

The purse fragment, a reconstruction, and related coins are on display at the Mušov Visitor Centre in Pasohlávky.

title: Code-GUI bidirectional editing via LSP
summary:
This article describes a proof-of-concept system built by James Vaughan that enables real-time bidirectional editing between a code editor and a GUI, using the Language Server Protocol (LSP). Inspired by Kevin Lynagh's idea of updating source code dynamically based on GUI interactions and vice-versa in code-based CAD, Vaughan created a demo where a text editor and a web-based GUI are synchronized via a small server. The server uses LSP to communicate with the text editor and WebSockets to communicate with the web app.

The author was motivated by a desire to use his preferred text editor (Emacs) with code-based CAD systems and was not satisfied with existing solutions that either lack real-time bidirectional editing or force the use of a specific, often less-capable, editor. The demo achieves real-time-ish updates in both directions, integrating seamlessly with the user's preferred editor, something the author finds lacking in other CAD tools.

While acknowledging that building a production-ready system is a significant undertaking, the author hopes the proof-of-concept will inspire further exploration of creative LSP server applications. He suggests OpenSCAD, with its existing LSP server, as a potential platform for a more advanced demo. Vaughan doesn't plan to continue the project himself soon, but encourages further development in this area, recognizing the complexities of conflict resolution, incremental edits, and overall LSP server internals.

title: Show HN: Spegel, a Terminal Browser That Uses LLMs to Rewrite Webpages
summary:
Spegel is a terminal web browser that uses LLMs to rewrite webpages, offering personalized views of content. Developed as a weekend project, it became more practical with the release of faster LLMs like Google's Gemini 2.5 Pro Lite. Spegel allows users to adapt web content to their needs by using custom prompts to generate simplified explanations, extract key information, or focus on specific aspects like recipes.

The browser fetches HTML content, processes it through an LLM based on user-defined prompts in a configuration file, and renders the output as markdown using Textual for the terminal user interface. This allows for live adjustments of prompts and views during browsing.

While there are existing terminal browsers like Lynx and Browsh, Spegel aims to clear away the clutter and noise of modern websites, which are often not optimized for terminal viewing. It does this by providing content tailored more closely to the user's needs via LLM-powered transformations.

Spegel is presented as an early-stage proof-of-concept, and is available for installation via pip. The source code is on GitHub for those who want to contribute.

title: Feasibility study of a mission to Sedna – Nuclear propulsion and solar sailing
summary:
This arXiv article, submitted in June 2025, presents a feasibility study for a mission to Sedna, a distant object in our solar system, using advanced propulsion technologies. The authors, Ancona, Kezerashvili, and Longo, explore the use of a Direct Fusion Drive (DFD) rocket engine based on D-$^{3}$He thermonuclear fusion and an advanced solar sail employing thermal desorption for propulsion.

The study compares the performance of both propulsion methods for a one-way Earth-to-Sedna mission. The DFD is envisioned for an orbit insertion, while the solar sail is proposed for a flyby. The analysis considers key mission parameters like payload capacity, travel time, and potential scientific return. The DFD, a 1.6 MW system, could reach Sedna in approximately 10 years with 1.5 years of thrusting. The solar sail, utilizing Jupiter's gravity assist, could complete the journey in 7 years.

The mission analysis includes departure, interplanetary acceleration, interplanetary coasting, and rendezvous phases. The authors emphasize the urgency due to Sedna's approaching perihelion in 2075-2076. The study also considers factors such as science payload accommodation, power availability, and communication constraints. The research provides a comparative foundation for future deep-space mission planning using these advanced propulsion concepts. The paper includes 26 pages and 5 figures.

title: Automatically Rewrite Container Image References in Kubernetes
summary:
This document describes a Kubernetes mutating admission webhook designed to automatically rewrite container image references. This is useful for implementing pull-through cache registries like AWS ECR, corporate image proxies, or redirecting images from public registries to internal ones.

The webhook uses `RegistryRewriteRule` CRDs to define rules based on regex patterns, targeting specific namespaces or pods based on labels. It features high performance due to in-memory rule caching, is secure by default using cert-manager, and provides Prometheus metrics.

Installation involves deploying cert-manager (if needed), installing the webhook, and creating `RegistryRewriteRule` instances. The document provides `make` commands for building, deploying, and uninstalling the webhook, as well as options for distributing the solution as a YAML bundle or Helm chart.

Examples demonstrate rewriting image references for Docker Hub, GCR, Quay.io, and GitHub Container Registry, including namespace and label-based conditions. The document also covers the webhook's architecture, troubleshooting steps, performance metrics, contributing guidelines, and licensing information. A key feature is the ability to disable image rewriting for specific pods using an annotation.

title: More assorted notes on Liquid Glass
summary:
This article critiques Apple's new user interface design, "Liquid Glass," focusing on its inconsistencies and potential drawbacks. The author argues that Apple's guidance on adopting Liquid Glass is contradictory, blurring the lines between content and navigation while simultaneously advising developers to clearly separate them. They criticize the increased padding and whitespace in lists and tables for reducing the amount of information displayed and find the redesigned switches unnecessary.

The author also takes issue with the Human Interface Guidelines' concepts of "Hierarchy," "Harmony," and "Consistency," deeming them poorly worded or logically flawed. A significant portion of the critique centers on the simplification of app icons, arguing that it leads to blandness and dilutes their meaning, using the evolution of icons like Dictionary and Migration Assistant as examples. The author fears this trend pushes developers toward generic, corporate designs.

The article highlights Apple's increasing control over app appearance, forcing developers to conform to Apple's aesthetic even if it clashes with their brand. This echoes concerns from C.M. Harrington and Louie Mantia. Mantia's critique emphasizes the burden on independent developers and companies to adapt to Apple's design system, with questionable returns. The author concludes by quoting Mantia and highlighting specific examples of Apple's guidelines that give Apple control over an app's visual appearance. The author finds Apple's recent recommendations to prioritize the system's visual effects over custom appearances stifling and restrictive compared to earlier, more supportive guidelines.

title: The Titanic’s Best Lifeboat
summary:
This article challenges the common narrative surrounding the Titanic disaster, specifically the belief that a lack of lifeboats was solely responsible for the high death toll. It argues that the focus on lifeboats as the primary safety measure was not the prevailing philosophy at the time.

Historically, lifeboats were not designed for mass evacuations. Early lifeboats were primarily shore-based rescue vessels, and those on ships were often poorly built and difficult to launch in stormy conditions. The prevailing strategy at the turn of the 20th century was to build ships so safe and sturdy that lifeboats would only be needed to transfer passengers to a rescue vessel, thus a full complement of lifeboats for everyone on board wasn't considered necessary.

The Titanic, considered one of the safest ships of its time with its advanced design and safety features, was struck by an iceberg in a uniquely vulnerable spot. Even with additional lifeboats, the article contends, the time constraints and conditions would have limited the number of additional lives saved.

The public outcry following the tragedy, fueled by the stark contrast between survivors and victims, led to a shift in perception, emphasizing the need for sufficient lifeboat capacity for all passengers. This culminated in the SOLAS treaty of 1914, mandating lifeboats for everyone onboard. While modern lifeboats are safer and more efficient, the article concludes that the ship itself remains the primary safety measure, but the impact of the Titanic disaster ensures that everyone deserves a lifeboat space.
chinese_title: 泰坦尼克号上最好的救生艇
chinese_summary:
本文挑战了围绕泰坦尼克号灾难的普遍说法，特别是认为救生艇不足是造成高死亡人数的唯一原因的观点。文章认为，当时将救生艇作为主要安全措施的观念并不流行。

历史上，救生艇并非为大规模疏散而设计。早期的救生艇主要为岸基救援船只，而船上的救生艇通常建造粗糙，难以在风暴天气中发射。20世纪初的主要策略是建造足够安全坚固的船只，使得救生艇仅用于将乘客转移到救援船上，因此没有必要为船上所有人配备足够数量的救生艇。

泰坦尼克号被认为是当时最安全的船只之一，拥有先进的设计和安全功能，但它在一个独特的脆弱点被冰山击中。文章认为，即使有额外的救生艇，时间限制和条件也会限制额外获救的人数。

这场悲剧引发了公众的强烈抗议，幸存者和遇难者的鲜明对比加剧了这种抗议，从而导致了人们观念的转变，强调了为所有乘客提供足够救生艇容量的必要性。这最终促成了1914年的SOLAS公约，该公约规定为船上所有人配备救生艇。虽然现代救生艇更安全、更高效，但文章总结道，船只本身仍然是主要的安全措施，但泰坦尼克号灾难的影响确保了每个人都应该拥有一个救生艇的位置。

title: The Past Is a Ghost and the Future a Fantasy
summary:
In "The Past Is a Ghost and the Future a Fantasy," John Steele explores the idea that our memories of the past and anticipations of the future are not fixed realities, but rather creations of the mind. He argues that remembering is not simply retrieval but a reconstruction process, where the brain infers, embellishes, and sometimes alters the past to serve survival and prediction. Steele uses the example of a childhood memory of a dog to illustrate how vivid recollections can be inaccurate.

Similarly, the future is not a prophecy but a simulation, crafted from memories and desires. The brain uses the same mechanisms to recall the past and construct potential futures. Steele highlights that humans are "time-binders," shaping time as they wish it to be. He emphasizes the importance of the present, the only time that is truly real, even though our perception of it is slightly delayed.

Steele connects this concept to ancient wisdom, referencing the Upanishads, and suggests that focusing on living well in the present is the key to happiness and hope. He acknowledges the challenge of inhabiting the present due to the mind's tendency to construct a narrative of self across time.

Ultimately, the article suggests that recognizing the constructed nature of the past and future can lead to freedom. Reframing personal and collective narratives can be acts of liberation, allowing us to cultivate meaning in the present and fully engage with the only reality we truly have.
chinese_title: 过去如鬼魅，未来似虚幻。
chinese_summary:
过去是幽灵，未来是幻想
约翰·斯蒂尔在《过去是幽灵，未来是幻想》一文中探讨了这样一个观点：我们对过去的记忆和对未来的憧憬并非固定不变的现实，而是大脑的创造。他认为，记忆不仅仅是检索，而是一个重构过程，大脑会推断、润色，有时甚至会改变过去，以服务于生存和预测。斯蒂尔以童年时对狗的记忆为例，说明了生动的回忆也可能是不准确的。

同样，未来不是预言，而是一种由记忆和欲望构建的模拟。大脑使用相同的机制来回忆过去和构建潜在的未来。斯蒂尔强调，人类是“时间束缚者”，可以按照自己的意愿塑造时间。他强调了当下的重要性，当下是唯一真实的时间，尽管我们对它的感知略有延迟。

斯蒂尔将这一概念与古代智慧联系起来，引用了奥义书，并提出专注于活在当下是幸福和希望的关键。他承认，由于大脑倾向于构建一个跨越时间的自我叙事，因此居住在当下具有挑战性。

最终，这篇文章表明，认识到过去和未来的构建性质可以带来自由。重塑个人和集体叙事可以是一种解放的行为，让我们能够在当下培养意义，并充分投入到我们真正拥有的唯一现实中。

title: Iran halts cooperation with UN nuclear watchdog
summary:
Iran has halted cooperation with the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) following U.S. strikes on its nuclear enrichment facilities in June. President Masoud Pezeshkian announced the suspension, which follows a bill passed by Iranian lawmakers requiring IAEA inspectors to obtain permission from Iran's Supreme National Security Council before visiting nuclear facilities. This permission will be based on the guaranteed security of Iran's nuclear facilities and activities.

The IAEA stated it is aware of the reports and awaiting official confirmation. This move comes after Iran already banned IAEA Director General Rafael Grossi from its nuclear facilities and removed surveillance cameras, actions condemned by the UK, France, and Germany. Grossi estimated the damage from the U.S. strikes was not "total," a statement that drew heavy criticism from Iranian officials, who felt he should have condemned the strikes.

Pezeshkian told French President Macron that "the trust in the U.N. nuclear inspectorate is broken inside Iran." The cooperation suspension represents a significant setback from the 2015 nuclear deal, which allowed IAEA access and inspections. The U.S. withdrew from that deal in 2018. Grossi has warned that Iran could resume enriching uranium "in a matter of months."
chinese_title: 伊朗暂停与联合国核监督机构的合作
chinese_summary:
伊朗在美国六月袭击其核浓缩设施后，已暂停与国际原子能机构（IAEA）的合作。总统马苏德·佩泽什基安宣布了这一暂停，此前伊朗立法者通过了一项法案，要求国际原子能机构的核查人员在访问核设施前必须获得伊朗最高国家安全委员会的许可。该许可将基于伊朗核设施和活动的安全保障。

国际原子能机构表示已获悉相关报道，正在等待官方确认。在此之前，伊朗已经禁止国际原子能机构总干事拉斐尔·格罗西进入其核设施，并移除了监控摄像头，这些行为受到了英国、法国和德国的谴责。格罗西估计美国袭击造成的损害并非“完全”，这一声明招致了伊朗官员的强烈批评，他们认为他应该谴责这些袭击。

佩泽什基安告诉法国总统马克龙，“伊朗国内对联合国核查机构的信任已经破裂”。合作暂停代表着对2015年核协议的重大倒退，该协议允许国际原子能机构进入和检查。美国于2018年退出了该协议。格罗西警告说，伊朗可能会在“几个月内”恢复铀浓缩。

title: Confidence in agentic AI: Why eval infrastructure must come first
summary:
This VentureBeat article discusses the growing use of AI agents in businesses, highlighting their potential to save time, increase conversion rates, and supercharge individual team members. Companies like Rocket Companies are seeing significant benefits, such as million-dollar savings and increased client capacity.

However, the article also addresses the complexities of implementing and scaling agentic AI. Challenges include moving from deterministic software engineering to the probabilistic nature of LLMs, orchestrating multiple models and agents, and ensuring responsiveness. As the number of agents and use cases grows, organizations need to address latency and routing issues.

While many companies initially built AI agent solutions in-house, the need for specialized expertise to maintain, debug, and improve these systems is driving companies to seek vendor relationships. Preparing for future complexity requires strong checks and balances, observability, monitoring, and human-in-the-loop processes for regulatory or critical tasks.

A key takeaway is the importance of establishing a robust evaluation infrastructure *before* building AI agents. This infrastructure allows businesses to define "good" agent behavior, test against a defined benchmark, and continuously improve the system. Simulation of conversations at scale is critical to uncovering unpredictable behaviors and ensuring reliable agent performance.

虽然许多公司最初都在内部构建人工智能代理解决方案，但维护、调试和改进这些系统所需的专业知识正在推动公司寻求与供应商建立合作关系。为应对未来复杂性，需要强大的制衡机制、可观察性、监控以及针对监管或关键任务的人工参与流程。

一个关键的结论是，在构建人工智能代理 *之前* 建立强大的评估基础设施至关重要。该基础设施使企业能够定义“良好”的代理行为，针对定义的基准进行测试，并持续改进系统。大规模模拟对话对于发现不可预测的行为并确保可靠的代理性能至关重要。

title: Show HN: Jobs by Referral: Find jobs in your LinkedIn network
summary:

The service works by having users upload their connection data, either through a data archive from their professional network provider or a CSV file. The CSV file needs to include fields like First Name, Last Name, Company, and Position for each connection. URL, Email Address, and Connected On are optional fields.

The goal is to leverage existing relationships to increase chances of getting referred and ultimately landing a job.

title: Converting a large mathematical software package written in C++ to C++20 modules
summary:
This arXiv paper, "Experience converting a large mathematical software package written in C++ to C++20 modules" by Wolfgang Bangerth, explores the practical aspects of migrating large C++ mathematical software from header-based interfaces to the newer C++20 module system. The paper uses the deal.II finite element library (800,000 lines of code) as a case study.

The author investigates an approach that allows the library to simultaneously support both header-based and module-based interfaces. He discusses the challenges encountered during the conversion process and provides insights into how modules function in real-world scenarios, assessing their impact on technical aspects like compile time and the human effort required for the transition.

The study found that converting a large project to modules is achievable with a significant, yet manageable, effort. While the conversion itself resulted in reduced compile times for the library, the impact on compile times for downstream projects using the converted library was inconclusive.

The paper concludes with reflections on long-term strategies for a broader adoption of modules across the mathematical software ecosystem, considering the potential challenges and benefits involved in such a large-scale shift.
chinese_title: 将一个用 C++ 编写的大型数学软件包转换为 C++20 模块

作者研究了一种允许该库同时支持基于头文件和基于模块的接口的方法。他讨论了转换过程中遇到的挑战，并深入了解了模块如何在实际场景中发挥作用，评估了它们对编译时间以及转换所需的人力等技术方面的影响。

研究发现，将大型项目转换为模块是可行的，需要付出相当大的努力，但可以控制。虽然转换本身缩短了库的编译时间，但对使用转换后库的下游项目的编译时间影响尚无定论。

论文最后反思了在数学软件生态系统中更广泛地采用模块的长期策略，考虑了这种大规模转变可能涉及的潜在挑战和收益。

title: Graph Theory Applications in Video Games
summary:
This article by Clara Nguyễn explores the applications of Graph Theory in video games. It begins by outlining how graph theory principles are used in 3D graphics, defining how vertices, edges, and triangles are represented and manipulated in computer graphics, differing from the abstract representations in theoretical graph theory.

The article then delves into specific game mechanics, such as lap counting in racing games. It explains how a checkpoint system can be interpreted as a Hamiltonian Circuit, where each checkpoint is a vertex, and completing a lap requires traversing all vertices and returning to the start. The article proposes a method for calculating the distance between players by reinterpreting the checkpoint graph as a straightened line, reducing distance computation to a simple subtraction. It also analyzes the "Ultra-Shortcut" glitch in Mario Kart Wii as a consequence of failing to guarantee Hamiltonian Circuit completion.

Finally, the article discusses maze generation using Disjoint-Sets and the Union-Find data structure. It details the properties of mazes, their graph representation, and how Disjoint-Sets can be used to efficiently generate them. The Union operation is explained, showing how it connects cells by removing walls between them, ultimately forming a complete maze. The article emphasizes that the Disjoint-Set data structure helps ensure that a maze generation algorithm creates a maze with a unique path from any cell to any other.

然后，文章深入研究了具体的游戏机制，例如赛车游戏中的圈数计算。它解释了检查点系统如何被解释为哈密顿回路，其中每个检查点都是一个顶点，完成一圈需要遍历所有顶点并返回起点。文章提出了一种计算玩家之间距离的方法，即将检查点图重新解释为一条直线，从而将距离计算简化为简单的减法。它还分析了《马里奥赛车Wii》中的“超级捷径”漏洞，认为这是未能保证哈密顿回路完整性的结果。

最后，文章讨论了使用不相交集和并查集数据结构生成迷宫的方法。它详细介绍了迷宫的特性、它们的图形表示，以及如何使用不相交集有效地生成它们。文章解释了联合操作，展示了它是如何通过移除单元格之间的墙壁来连接单元格，最终形成一个完整的迷宫。文章强调，不相交集数据结构有助于确保迷宫生成算法创建一个从任何单元格到任何其他单元格都具有唯一路径的迷宫。

title: The Chapel Programming Language
summary:
The Chapel Programming Language is designed for productive parallel computing at any scale, from laptops to supercomputers. It's an open-source language built for performance, readability, and scalability. Chapel supports various parallel programming paradigms, including distributed execution and GPU programming, with features designed to minimize boilerplate code and maximize productivity.

Chapel's key features include being productive, parallel, fast, scalable, GPU-enabled, and open. It is praised by users for its readability and ability to hide complexity until needed, making it accessible to both students and experienced developers.

title: Mandelbrot in x86 Assembly by Claude
summary:

The author, using a Dockerfile generated by Claude based on the initial code, attempted to compile and run the code on a Mac. After numerous failed attempts and compilation errors, the author utilized Claude Code (with the `--dangerously-skip-permissions` option) to iteratively debug and modify the assembly code within a Docker environment.

Claude Code analyzed the errors, modified the assembly, and re-ran the build process in a loop. Initially, the output was a flawed image consisting only of "@" symbols, indicating a problem with the iteration count. After the author expressed dissatisfaction with this result, Claude Code continued to refine the code. Ultimately, Claude Code succeeded in producing an ASCII art image of the Mandelbrot fractal, with the author providing the final, functional assembly code, Dockerfile, and the full transcript of the Claude Code session. title: Building a Personal AI Factory
summary:
This article describes a "personal AI factory" for software development, built around Claude Code and local models like Goose and o3. The core principle is to "fix inputs, not outputs," focusing on improving the system rather than patching individual code errors.

The workflow consists of three steps: **Planning**, **Execution**, and **Verification/Feedback**.  o3 generates a plan from a high-level task, which is then refined. Sonnet 4 verifies the plan and creates a task list. Claude Code, using Sonnet 3.7 or 4, executes the plan and commits changes along the way. Finally, Sonnet 4 and o3 verify the generated code against the plan and the original request, respectively, identifying issues that are then incorporated into the plan template for future runs.

The author uses Git worktrees to enable parallel development, running multiple Claude Code instances simultaneously. A key element is the creation of specialized agents to handle specific tasks, like code styling and integrating internal libraries. The author stresses iterating inputs (plans, prompts, agent mix) rather than debugging generated code, and running agents in parallel to learn from failures.

Future improvements focus on better agent coordination, aligning business documentation with agent needs, and more complex workflows. The author also aims to maximize token usage across different model providers to overcome Bedrock's token limits. The goal is to create a system that can reliably produce code, while continuously improving its own processes and instructions.

title: Swearing as a Response to Pain: Assessing Effects of Novel Swear Words
summary:
This study investigated whether the pain-reducing effects of swearing are due to emotional arousal or distraction by testing novel "swear" words. Researchers compared the effects of repeating the conventional swear word "fuck," two new words "fouch" (designed to be emotionally arousing) and "twizpipe" (designed to be distracting), and a neutral word on pain threshold and tolerance using a cold pressor task. Ninety-two participants immersed their hand in ice water while repeating one of the four words, and their heart rate, pain perception, and ratings of emotion, humor, and distraction were measured.

The results replicated previous findings, showing that repeating "fuck" increased pain threshold and tolerance compared to the neutral word, and was associated with higher ratings of emotion, humor, and distraction. However, the new "swear" words, "fouch" and "twizpipe," while rated as more emotional and humorous than the neutral word, did not improve pain threshold or tolerance. No significant changes in heart rate or pain perception were observed across conditions.

Mediation analysis did not identify a clear pathway through which swearing alleviates pain, suggesting distraction is not a key factor. The study supports the idea that emotional arousal may contribute to the hypoalgesic effect of swearing, but further research is needed. The findings also indicate that the pain-relieving effect is not easily replicated with newly created words, possibly due to the lack of learned associations inherent in established swear words.
chinese_title: 以咒骂应对疼痛：评估新型脏话的效果
chinese_summary:

结果重现了之前的发现，表明与中性词相比，重复“fuck”增加了疼痛阈值和耐受度，并且与更高的情绪、幽默感和分心程度评分相关。然而，新的“脏话”“fouch”和“twizpipe”虽然被评为比中性词更具情感性和幽默感，但并未提高疼痛阈值或耐受度。在各种条件下均未观察到心率或疼痛感知的显着变化。

中介分析未确定说脏话缓解疼痛的明确途径，表明注意力转移不是关键因素。该研究支持情绪唤醒可能有助于说脏话的镇痛效果的观点，但还需要进一步研究。研究结果还表明，疼痛缓解效果不容易通过新造的词语重现，这可能是由于缺乏已建立的脏话中固有的学习联想。

title: Show HN: Core – open source memory graph for LLMs – shareable, user owned
summary:
C.O.R.E. (Contextual Observation & Recall Engine) is an open-source, user-owned memory graph for LLMs, offering a private, portable, and shareable solution for managing context. It allows users to store and access their information locally or via a hosted version, connecting it to tools like Cursor and Claude for personalized AI responses.

Unlike simple "sticky note" memory systems, C.O.R.E. functions as a dynamic temporal knowledge graph where each fact is a "Statement" with its full history (what was said, who said it, when, and why it matters). This provides transparency and traceability.

Key features include the ability to ingest data, search within a private memory space, and use it for workspaces. Users can audit changes (e.g., pricing updates), trace the sources of information, and understand why the system believes something.

The article details both cloud and local setup instructions. Cloud setup involves signing up, adding text to generate the graph, and connecting with Cursor. Local setup uses Docker, requires an OpenAI API key, and involves copying environment variables, starting the application, and logging in via a magic link. The guide also details how to connect C.O.R.E to Cursor as an MCP server.

Furthermore, C.O.R.E. offers APIs for ingestion and searching, requiring an API key for authentication. Example request bodies for both are provided.

The tool is actively under development, with plans to include multiple spaces with unique URLs, user-controlled sharing, ingestion filters, granular API key permissions, improved session support, audit logging, role-based access control, webhooks, and notifications. It advises against storing sensitive data, credentials, or system logs.

title: The Velvet Sundown are a seemingly AI-generated band with 325k Spotify listeners
summary:

title: All Good Editors Are Pirates: In Memory of Lewis H. Lapham
summary:
Kira Brunner Don's "All Good Editors Are Pirates: In Memory of Lewis H. Lapham" is a personal reflection on the life and influence of the late Lewis H. Lapham, renowned essayist, editor, and founder of *Lapham's Quarterly*. Don, who served as the magazine's founding executive editor, fondly recounts her eight years working alongside Lapham, highlighting his unique approach to magazine creation and his profound impact on her career.

The article details the humble beginnings of *Lapham's Quarterly* in 2007, contrasting it with the thriving publication it later became. Don emphasizes Lapham's dedication, work ethic, and inclusive leadership style, noting his willingness to seek input from everyone, regardless of their position. She recalls his insistence on quality writing, thoughtful discussion, and a laissez-faire approach to editing, inspiring creativity and independence.

Don also shares anecdotes that reveal Lapham's personality, from his glamorous social life to his penchant for cigarette smoke and his mantra, "Onward, dear heart." She emphasizes how Lapham's mentorship shaped her understanding of magazine creation and instilled a belief in valuing voice and in-depth exploration of ideas.

The piece culminates in Don's acknowledgment of Lapham's influence on her own venture, *Stranger's Guide*, co-founded with Abby Rapoport, and expresses a sense of loss for the passing of a literary era. Ultimately, the article serves as a heartfelt tribute to a man who taught her how to be a "pirate" editor, stealing the best ideas and forging her own path.

title: The Surprising Reason Rural Hospitals Are Closing
summary:
This article investigates the alarming trend of rural hospital closures across the U.S., focusing on the case of Thomasville Regional Medical Center in Alabama. While common assumptions blame low Medicare and Medicaid reimbursement rates, the article argues that the primary culprit is inadequate compensation from private insurers.

Rural hospitals depend heavily on private insurance for revenue, often covering 65-80% of patient costs. However, these hospitals face significant challenges in negotiating fair reimbursement rates with insurers due to their lower patient volumes and lack of bargaining power. In Alabama, the dominance of Blue Cross and Blue Shield, controlling 94% of the large-group private insurance market, further limits hospitals' negotiating abilities, leading to severely underpaid services.

The closure of rural hospitals has dire consequences for communities, forcing residents to travel long distances for medical care, delaying treatment, and increasing hospitalization rates and lengths of stay. It also negatively impacts the local economy by discouraging new businesses and affecting the health of the workforce.

The article highlights potential solutions, including rural hospitals joining larger urban hospital networks for better negotiating power, forming rural hospital networks, and government intervention through legislation like the Rural Hospital Stabilization Act. The author also touches on the importance of preventative care and potential for AI technology in rural hospitals. Ultimately, the article emphasizes the critical role of rural hospitals in maintaining community health and the urgent need for addressing the financial challenges they face.
chinese_title: 农村医院倒闭的惊人原因
chinese_summary:
本文调查了美国农村医院倒闭这一令人担忧的趋势，重点关注阿拉巴马州托马斯维尔地区医疗中心的案例。虽然普遍认为医疗保险和医疗补助的低报销率是罪魁祸首，但本文认为，主要原因是来自私人保险公司的不充分补偿。

农村医院严重依赖私人保险的收入，通常覆盖65-80%的患者费用。然而，由于患者数量较少且缺乏议价能力，这些医院在与保险公司谈判公平的报销率方面面临重大挑战。在阿拉巴马州，蓝十字蓝盾在大型团体私人保险市场中占据主导地位，控制了94%的市场份额，这进一步限制了医院的谈判能力，导致服务报酬严重不足。

农村医院的倒闭给社区带来了可怕的后果，迫使居民长途跋涉寻求医疗服务，延误治疗，并增加了住院率和住院时间。它还通过阻碍新企业的发展和影响劳动力的健康，对当地经济产生负面影响。

本文重点介绍了潜在的解决方案，包括农村医院加入更大的城市医院网络以获得更好的议价能力，组建农村医院网络，以及政府通过《农村医院稳定法案》等立法进行干预。作者还提到了预防性保健的重要性以及人工智能技术在农村医院中的潜力。最终，本文强调了农村医院在维护社区健康方面的关键作用，以及解决它们所面临的金融挑战的迫切需要。

title: The Hoyle State (2021)
summary:
This article delves into the complexities of nuclear physics, particularly focusing on the Hoyle state of carbon-12. It begins by explaining the challenges in understanding atomic nuclei, contrasting the strong nuclear force with the electromagnetic force and introducing models like the liquid drop model and the shell model to simplify the understanding of nuclear structure.

The article then explains that the nucleus can be thought of as made up of smaller nuclei like deuterons, tritons, helions, and alpha particles. It introduces the Hoyle state, an excited state of carbon-12 where it behaves as three alpha particles orbiting each other, having slightly more energy than three separate alpha particles. This allows the carbon in this excited state to break apart into three alpha particles.

The energy level of the Hoyle state is remarkably close to the energy of a beryllium-8 nucleus plus an alpha particle. This near-resonance, predicted by Fred Hoyle, is crucial for carbon formation in stars, as it facilitates the fusion of alpha particles with beryllium nuclei. While some consider this a triumph of the anthropic principle, the author argues that Hoyle's original prediction was driven by observed elemental abundances in stars and the anthropic interpretation is unnecessary.

The article concludes by highlighting the ongoing research using supercomputers to further understand the Hoyle state, noting that even ground-state carbon can be approximated as three alpha particles in a tight triangle, while the Hoyle state resembles a bent arm configuration.
chinese_title: 霍伊尔态 (2021)
chinese_summary:
本文深入探讨了核物理学的复杂性，特别关注碳-12的霍伊尔态。文章首先解释了理解原子核所面临的挑战，对比了强核力与电磁力，并介绍了液滴模型和壳模型等模型，以简化对核结构的理解。

文章随后解释说，原子核可以被认为是较小原子核的集合，如氘核、氚核、氦核和α粒子。文章介绍了霍伊尔态，它是碳-12的一种激发态，在此状态下，碳-12表现为三个互相环绕的α粒子，其能量略高于三个分离的α粒子。这使得处于这种激发态的碳可以分解成三个α粒子。

霍伊尔态的能级非常接近铍-8原子核加上一个α粒子的能量。这种接近共振的现象，由弗雷德·霍伊尔预测，对于恒星中碳的形成至关重要，因为它促进了α粒子与铍核的融合。虽然有些人认为这是人择原理的胜利，但作者认为，霍伊尔最初的预测是基于恒星中观察到的元素丰度，而人择解释是不必要的。

文章最后强调了利用超级计算机进一步理解霍伊尔态的持续研究，并指出即使是基态碳也可以近似为紧密三角形中的三个α粒子，而霍伊尔态则类似于弯曲的手臂结构。

title: I built something that changed my friend group's social fabric
summary:
In 2022, the author's friend group, scattered across the globe, struggled to coordinate gaming sessions and casual chats due to overwhelming notifications in their Signal group chat. The problem stemmed from messages about playing games getting buried and friends missing out on impromptu gatherings.

The author created a Discord bot that sends a notification to the server when someone joins a voice channel. This "batsignal" aimed to address the notification overload and encourage spontaneous interactions. The bot was built using discord.py, tracking joins, and storing data in a Supabase-hosted Postgres database.

Initially met with skepticism, the bot quickly became popular. It significantly reduced coordination messages and fostered a culture of informal hangouts beyond planned gaming sessions. Data collected over the years showed consistent high usage of the Discord server, with thousands of joins annually. The author attributes the bot's success to its ability to facilitate quick, casual interactions, especially beneficial for busy friends and new parents.

The author now creates an annual "Discord Wrapped" for the friend group's Christmas party, highlighting individual and group usage statistics. Future plans include adding achievements and tracking time spent in Discord. The author also envisions an IoT device with RGB lights indicating when designated friends join Discord voice channels, considering turning it into a real product if there's enough interest.
chinese_title: 我做了一个东西，改变了我的朋友圈子的社交结构。
chinese_summary:
2022年，作者的朋友们分散在世界各地，由于Signal群聊中大量的通知，难以协调游戏会话和随意聊天。问题在于关于玩游戏的消息被淹没，朋友们错过了即兴聚会。

作者创建了一个Discord机器人，当有人加入语音频道时，该机器人会向服务器发送通知。这个“蝙蝠信号”旨在解决通知过载问题，并鼓励自发互动。该机器人使用discord.py构建，跟踪加入情况，并将数据存储在Supabase托管的Postgres数据库中。

起初，该机器人受到质疑，但很快就流行起来。它显著减少了协调消息，并培养了一种超越计划游戏会话的非正式聚会文化。多年来收集的数据显示，Discord服务器的使用率一直很高，每年有数千人加入。作者将该机器人的成功归功于其促进快速、随意互动的能力，这对忙碌的朋友和新手父母尤其有益。

作者现在每年为朋友们的圣诞派对制作一份“Discord年度回顾”，突出个人和群组的使用统计数据。未来的计划包括增加成就并跟踪在Discord中花费的时间。作者还设想了一种物联网设备，该设备带有RGB灯，指示指定的朋友何时加入Discord语音频道，并考虑在有足够兴趣的情况下将其变成真正的产品。

title: When Did Nature Burst into Vivid Color?
summary:
This article explores the evolutionary history of color vision and colorful signals in nature, tackling the question of which came first. Evolutionary biologists Zachary Emberts and John Wiens reconstructed 500 million years of evolutionary history using fossil records and phylogenetic trees. They hypothesized that color vision and colorful signals evolved in tandem.

Their research suggests that color vision evolved earlier than previously thought, between 400 and 500 million years ago, predating the emergence of colorful signals by 100-200 million years. Colorful fruits and seeds appeared around 300 million years ago, followed by flowers (140-250 million years ago), warning coloration (130 million years ago), and finally, sexual signaling colors in animals (100 million years ago).

The independent evolution of color vision in arthropods and vertebrates, and the diverse color perception abilities across species, highlight the complexity of this evolutionary process. The article discusses the challenges of reconstructing evolutionary history, acknowledging that colors don't easily fossilize, and traits can appear and disappear over time. Despite these limitations, the study provides valuable insights into the development of color in the natural world, suggesting that color vision initially evolved for reasons beyond signaling, possibly for object recognition or navigating aquatic environments. The article concludes by speculating that nature is likely to become even more colorful due to the ongoing evolution of warning and sexual signals.
chinese_title: 自然何时变得色彩斑斓？
chinese_summary:
本文探讨了色彩视觉和自然界中鲜艳信号的进化历史，旨在解决哪个先出现的问题。进化生物学家 Zachary Emberts 和 John Wiens 利用化石记录和系统发育树，重构了五亿年的进化史。他们假设色彩视觉和鲜艳信号是协同进化的。

他们的研究表明，色彩视觉的进化时间比之前认为的要早，大约在4亿到5亿年前，比鲜艳信号的出现早1亿到2亿年。鲜艳的水果和种子大约在3亿年前出现，随后是花朵（1.4亿到2.5亿年前）、警戒色（1.3亿年前），最后是动物的性信号颜色（1亿年前）。

节肢动物和脊椎动物中色彩视觉的独立进化，以及物种间多样的色彩感知能力，突显了这一进化过程的复杂性。文章讨论了重构进化史的挑战，承认颜色不易形成化石，并且性状会随着时间的推移而出现和消失。尽管存在这些局限性，该研究为自然界中色彩的发展提供了宝贵的见解，表明色彩视觉最初的进化原因可能并非为了信号传递，而是为了物体识别或在水生环境中导航。文章最后推测，由于警戒信号和性信号的不断进化，自然界可能会变得更加色彩缤纷。

title: Australians to face age checks from search engines
summary:
Here's a concise summary of the article:

In Australia, search engines like Google and Microsoft's Bing will be required to implement age assurance checks for logged-in users by the end of 2025. This is part of a new online safety code developed with technology companies and registered by the eSafety Commissioner. If a user is determined to be under 18, the search engine will automatically activate the highest safety settings, filtering out pornography and high-impact violence.

Age assurance methods could include ID verification, biometrics, or using online activity data to infer age. Non-logged-in users will also see default blurring of explicit content. The code also mandates improvements to search and age assurance tech, prevention of harmful autocomplete suggestions, and providing crisis information for searches related to self-harm.

The aim is to protect Australian children, and the code was co-led by Digital Industry Group Inc. (DIGI), whose members include Google and Microsoft. Failure to comply could result in substantial penalties. The eSafety Commissioner is also seeking further safety commitments from the industry regarding app stores, device manufacturers, social media, and messaging services, particularly concerning the use of generative AI chatbots by children. If the changes proposed by the industry are unsatisfactory, the eSafety Commissioner will move to developing mandatory standards.
